solution.text:
The system above is an Open System because it allows both matter and energy to flow freely between the system and the surroundings. Remember that:
  • Open System : Allows exchange of energy and matter between system and surroundings
  • Closed System : Allows exchange of only energy between system and surroundings
  • Isolated System : Allows exchange of neither energy nor matter between system and surroundings

content.text: How would you characterise the given system?
